description.english: Eat two sushi rolls hovering over the bridge.
description.german: Esse zwei Sushi-Rollen über der Brücke.
description.spanish: Cómete dos de los rollos de sushi que flotan sobre el puente.
description.schinese: 吃掉桥上悬挂的寿司卷。
description.russian: Съесть суши роллы, висящие над мостом.
description.portuguese: Come 2 rolos de sushi passando debaixo da ponte.
description.polish: Zjedz dwie rolki sushi unoszące się nad mostem.
description.norwegian: Spis to sushiruller som svever over broen.
description.swedish: Ät två sushirullar i luften över bron.
description.hungarian: Egyél meg két szusi tekercset miközben a híd felett lebegsz.
description.czech: Sněz dvě sushi rolky vznášející se nad mostem.
description.turkish: Köprünün üstünde havada duran iki suşiyi ye
description.french: Mangez deux sushis flottant au-dessus du pont.
description.vietnamese: Ăn 2 cuộn sushi treo lơ lửng trên cầu.
description.italian: Mangia due rotolini di sushi che sorvolano il ponte.
description.brazilian: Coma dois rolos de sushi pairando sobre a ponte.

description.spanish: Destruye algo.
description.portuguese: Esgama qualquer coisa.
description.french: Écrasez quelque chose.
description.vietnamese: Đập vỡ vật thể bất kỳ.
description.italian: Spacca qualcosa.
description.brazilian: Esmague alguma coisa.

description.spanish: Destruye al con la cabeza.
description.schinese: 有时候要动脑来毁坏些东西。
description.russian: Иногда надо использовать голову, чтобы что-нибудь сломать.
description.portuguese: Esmaga algo com a tua cabeça.
description.french: Écrasez quelque chose avec votre tête.
description.vietnamese: Smash something by your head.
description.italian: Distruggi qualcosa con la tua testa.
description.brazilian: Esmague algo com a sua cabeça.

description.spanish: Corre como el viento.
description.portuguese: Corre com o vento.
description.french: Courez comme le vent.
description.vietnamese: Chạy nhanh như gió.
description.italian: Corri come il vento.
description.brazilian: Corra como o vento.

description.english: Jump upon junk boat roof like a pirate.
description.german: Springe von der Planke, wie ein Pirat.
description.spanish: Salta sobre el techo del bote de basura como un pirata.
description.schinese: 像真正的海盗一样跳到船顶。
description.russian: Запрыгнуть на крышу лодки как настоящий пират.
description.portuguese: Salta para o telhado do barco velho como um pirata.
description.polish: Wskocz na dżonkę niczym prawdziwy pirat.
description.norwegian: Hopp som en pirat på taket til en søppelbåt.
description.swedish: Hoppa på den risiga båten som en pirat.
description.hungarian: Ugorj fel a hajóroncs tetejére, mint egy kalóz.
description.czech: Naskoč na střechu odpadní lodi jako pirát.
description.turkish: Yelkenlinin üstüne bir korsan gibi atla
description.french: Sautez sur le toit de la jonque comme un pirate.
description.vietnamese: Jump upon junk boat roof like a pirate.
description.italian: Salta sul tetto di una nave per la spazzatura come un pirata.
description.brazilian: Salte sobre o telhado do barco de lixo como um pirata.

description.english: Find California Roll on Japanese islands.
description.russian: Найти Ролл Калифорния на Японских островах.
description.portuguese: Encontra rolos de california nas ilhas japonesas.
description.polish: Znajdź Kalifornijską rolkę na japońskich wyspach.
description.swedish: Hitta en California Roll på japanska öarna.
description.norwegian: Finn en Californiarull på en japansk øy.
description.schinese: 在日本岛上找到加利福尼亚卷
description.german: Finde die California Roll auf den japanischen Inseln.
description.hungarian: Találd meg a Kaliforniai tekercset a Japán szigeteken.
description.spanish: Encuentra un rollo California en las Islas Japoneses.
description.french: Trouvez le Maki Californien sur les îles Japonaises.
description.vietnamese: FĂn Sushi kiểu Mỹ trên đất Nhật.
description.italian: Trova California Roll sulle Isole Giapponesi.
description.brazilian: Encontre Rolo Californiano em ilhas japonesas.

description.portuguese: Tutorial completo.
description.spanish: Tutorial completado.
description.french: Сomplétez le tutoriel.
description.vietnamese: Hoàn thành hướng dẫn game.
description.italian: Сompleta il tutorial.
description.brazilian: Tutorial completo.

description.english: Find all hidden sushi rolls in the home village.
description.russian: Найти все спрятанные роллы в родной деревне.
description.portuguese: Encontra todos os rolos de sushi escondidos na vila.
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie ukryte rolki sushi w rodzinnej wiosce.
description.swedish: Hitta alla gömda Sushirullar i hembyn.
description.norwegian: Finn alle skjulte sushiruller i hjemlandsbyen.
description.schinese: 在自己村子里找到所有被藏起来的寿司卷。
description.czech: Najdi všechny sushi rolky v rodné vesnici.
description.german: Finde alle versteckten Sushi-Rollen in deinem Heimat-Dorf.
description.hungarian: Találj meg minden elrejtett szusi tekercset a szülőfaludban.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los rollos de sushi escondidos en la aldea.
description.french: Trouvez tous les sushis cachés dans le village de départ.
description.vietnamese: Ăn tất cả các cuộn sushi ở trong làng.
description.italian: Trova tutti gli involtini di sushi nascosti nel villaggio di casa.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os rolos de sushi escondidos na aldeia.

description.english: Eat everything you can find in the dark wood.
description.russian: Съесть все что можно в темном лесу.
description.portuguese: Come tudo o que encontrares na madeira escura.
description.polish: Zjedz wszystko co się da w mrocznym lesie.
description.finnish: Syö kaikki mitä löydät tummasta metsästä.
description.swedish: Ät allt du kan hitta i den mörka skogen.
description.norwegian: Spis alt du kommer over i den mørke skogen.
description.schinese: 吃掉黑暗的森林里一切可以吃的东西。
description.czech: Sněz vše, co najdeš v Temných lesích.
description.german: Esse einfach alles im dunklen Wald.
description.hungarian: Egyél meg mindent amit a sötét erdőben találsz.
description.spanish: Cómete todo lo que puedas encontrar en el bosque tenebroso.
description.french: Mangez tout ce qui peut l'être dans le Sombre Bois.
description.vietnamese: Ăn tất cả mọi thứ trong khu rừng tối tăm.
description.italian: Mangia tutto ciò che puoi trovare nel legno scuro.
description.brazilian: Coma tudo o que você conseguir encontrar na mata escura.

description.english: Eat black sushi rolls in the Ninja Dojo.
description.russian: Съесть все черные роллы в школе Ниндзя.
description.portuguese: Come rolos de sushi negro no Dojo dos Ninjas.
description.polish: Zjedz czarne rolki sushi w Dojo Ninja.
description.turkish: Ninja Okulu'ndaki tüm siyah suşileri ye
description.schinese: 吃掉忍者学校中的所有黑色寿司卷。
description.czech: Sněz černé sushi v ninja doju.
description.german: Esse alle schwarzen Sushi-Rollen im Ninja-Dojo.
description.hungarian: Egyél fekete szusi tekercseket a nindzsa dodzsóban.
description.spanish: Cómete los rollos de sushi negro en el Dojo Ninja.
description.french: Mangez des sushis noirs au Dojo Ninja.
description.vietnamese: Ăn các cuộn sushi đen ở võ đường Ninja.
description.italian: Mangia rotolini di sushi nero nel Ninja Dojo.
description.brazilian: Coma rolos pretos de sushi no Dojo Ninja.

description.english: Eat the dinner of famous ninjas.
description.portuguese: Come o jantar dos ninjas famosos.
description.turkish: Tüm ünlü ninjaların akşam yemeğini ye
description.schinese: 吃掉著名忍者们的所有食物。
description.german: Verspeise das Abendessen der berüchtigten Ninjas.
description.hungarian: Edd meg a híres nindzsák ebédjét.
description.spanish: Cómete la cena de los famosos ninjas.
description.french: Mangez le dîner de célèbres Ninjas.
description.vietnamese: Chén sạch các món ăn của những ninja nổi tiếng.
description.italian: Mangia la cena dei famosi ninja.
description.brazilian: Coma o jantar dos ninjas famosos.

description.portuguese: Invade o Mosteiro de Mugen.
description.norwegian: Bryt deg inn i Mugen kloster.
description.spanish: Escabúllete en el Monasterio de Mugen.
description.french: Entrez par effraction dans le Monastère Mugen.
description.vietnamese: Đột nhập vào tu viện Mugen.
description.italian: Irrompi nel Monastero di Mugen.
description.brazilian: Invada o Mosteiro Mugen.

description.english: Visit three taverns in the night city.
description.russian: Посетить три трактира в ночном городе.
description.portuguese: Visita três tavernas na cidade noturna.
description.polish: Odwiedź trzy gospody w nocnym mieście.
description.turkish: Gece vakti şehirdeki üç tavernayı ziyaret et
description.czech: Navštiv tři bary v Nočním městě.
description.german: Besuche drei Tavernen in der Stadt bei Nacht.
description.hungarian: Látogasd meg mindhárom kocsmát az éjvárosban.
description.spanish: Visita tres tabernas en la ciudad nocturna.
description.french: Visitez trois tavernes dans la ville nocturne.
description.vietnamese: Ghé thăm 3 quán rượu ở thành phố trong đêm.
description.italian: Visita tre taverne nella città notturna.
description.brazilian: Visite três tabernas na cidade da noite.

description.portuguese: Sai das masmorras.
description.spanish: Sal del calabozo.
description.french: Échappez-vous du donjon.
description.vietnamese: Thoát ra khỏi ngục tối.
description.italian: Esci dal dungeon.
description.brazilian: Saia do calabouço.

description.english: Eat all Wasabi rolls in the dungeon.
description.portuguese: Come todo os rolos de Wasabi dentro das masmorras.
description.polish: Zjedz wszystkie rolki wasabi w podziemiu.
description.turkish: Mağarada bulabildiğin tüm Wasabi Roll'ları ye
description.schinese: 在地洞中吃掉所有芥末寿司卷。
description.hungarian: Edd meg az összese Wasabi tekercset a várbörtönben.
description.spanish: Cómete todos los rollos de Wasabi en el calabozo.
description.french: Mangez tous les Makis au Wasabi dans le donjon.
description.vietnamese: Ăn tất cả cuộn Wasabi trong ngục tối.
description.italian: Mangia tutti i panini Wasabi nel dungeon.
description.brazilian: Coma todos os rolos Wasabi no calabouço.

description.portuguese: Encontra a pedra do sonho.
description.spanish: Encuentra la Piedra de los Sueños.
description.french: Trouvez la pierre de rêves.
description.vietnamese: Tìm được Viên ngọc Giấc mộng.
description.italian: Trova la Pietra del Sogno.
description.brazilian: Encontre a Pedra dos Sonhos.

description.german: Drehe die Zeit insgesamt 15 Minuten zurück.
description.french: Rembobiner 15 minutes en arrière.
description.italian: Riavvolgi indietro il tempo di 30 minuti.
description.spanish: Retroceda 15 minutos hacia atrás.
description.portuguese: Rebobinar 15 minutos.
description.brazilian: Retroceda o tempo em 15 minutos.
description.vietnamese: Quay ngược 15 phút trước đó

description.portuguese: Torna-te o mestre do Ninjutsu.
description.spanish: Conviértete en un maestro del Ninjutsu.
description.french: Devenez le maître du Ninjutsu.
description.vietnamese: Làm chủ bí kíp Ninjutsu.
description.italian: Diventa il maestro del Ninjutsu.
description.brazilian: Torne-se o mestre do Ninjutsu.

description.portuguese: Chega ao rank de Maegashira.
description.spanish: Alcanza el rango Maegashira.
description.french: Obtenez le rang de Maegashira.
description.vietnamese: Đạt được cấp bậc Maegashira.
description.italian: Raggiungi il grado di Maegashira.
description.brazilian: Alcance o rank Maegashira.

description.portuguese: Chega ao rank de Yokozuna.
description.spanish: Alcanza el rango Yokozuna.
description.french: Obtenez le rang de Yokozuna.
description.vietnamese: Đạt được cấp bậc Yokozuna.
description.italian: Raggiungi il grado di Yokozuna.
description.brazilian: Alcance o rank Yokozuna.
